details:
An issue has been found in axis, a SOAP implementation in Java.
The issue is related to a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack in the default
servlet/services.


For Debian 9 stretch, this problem has been fixed in version
1.4-25+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your axis packages.


For the detailed security status of axis please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/axis>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
